item.description: What is not overtly bound by a rule is covertly ruled by chance.

Real life doesn’t care about human narrative conventions.
It’s one of its few redeeming qualities.

Pyramid scheme where the business model is “teaching how to setup pyramid schemes”. The instructors take a cut from the pyramid schemes their clients set up.

If someone asks “wait, isn’t this a pyramid scheme?” the reply is always “of course it is! But it is YOUR pyramid scheme.”. Everyone believes they are near the top because they are all being so open about the fact that they are making pyramid schemes.

I would totally make a deal with the devil from the classic folktale Don’t Make A Deal With The Devil, No, Seriously, Even If You Think You Are Too Clever To Listen To Classic Folktales About Making Deals With The Devil because I’m too clever to listen to classic folktales about making deals with the devil.

item.title: About Me
item.description:
I go by Wotton / わたん / ParaPri / Paraconsistent Prior.
I’m obsessed with reasoning.
